name: Black Sheep (cheenoo321)
description:
My first ever visual novel!

The story follows Hunter, a high school boy having trouble fitting in. But a chance meeting with the new transfer student might change his life...?

I'm so excited I finally finished with this. It's very short, and takes about 30 minutes to finish the whole story. There are no choices either, as I am not used to ren'py yet.

This is so cringey, but I hope you still enjoy!
